column5: Well i got a invite from Team Hot Reels to be a observer for the salmon tourny  Out of Port Dalhousie this weekend and i was just wondering if anybody  is participating in the tournament i figured it would be nice to run into some  of the board members?????
i'll be on the water, but not in the Scotty  take lots of notes, your very fortunate to be aboard one of thee top boats of Lake O
